file.name: swaggerMetaData.yaml
file.content:
components: securitySchemes: AuthorizationToken: bearerFormat: nonce token or JWT description: OAuth Bearer Token - A valid Bearer token to prove authorization scheme: bearer type: http info: description: |- The Breeding API (BrAPI) is a Standardized REST ful Web Service API Specification for communicating Plant Breeding Data. BrAPI allows for easy data sharing between databases and tools involved in plant breeding.

General Reference Documentation

URL Structure
Response Structure
Date/Time Encoding
Location Encoding
Error Handling
Search Services

BrAPI Core

The BrAPI Core module contains high level entities used for organization and management. This includes Programs, Trials, Studies, Locations, People, and Lists
V2.0
GitHub
SwaggerHub
Apiary

BrAPI Phenotyping

The BrAPI Phenotyping module contains entities related to phenotypic observations. This includes Observation Units, Observations, Observation Variables, Traits, Scales, Methods, and Images
V2.0
GitHub
SwaggerHub
Apiary

BrAPI Genotyping

The BrAPI Genotyping module contains entities related to genotyping analysis. This includes Samples, Markers, Variant Sets, Variants, Call Sets, Calls, References, Reads, and Vendor Orders
V2.0
GitHub
SwaggerHub
Apiary

BrAPI Germplasm

The BrAPI Germplasm module contains entities related to germplasm management. This includes Germplasm, Germplasm Attributes, Seed Lots, Crosses, Pedigree, and Progeny
V2.0
GitHub
SwaggerHub
Apiary
title: BrAPI-Germplasm version: '2.0' openapi: 3.0.0 paths: {} security: - AuthorizationToken: [] servers: - url: https://test-server.brapi.org/brapi/v2 tags: - name: Germplasm description: Information about Germplasm externalDocs: description: Docs url: https://wiki.brapi.org/ - name: Germplasm Attributes description: Information about Germplasm Attributes externalDocs: description: Docs url: https://wiki.brapi.org/ - name: Germplasm Attribute Values description: Information about Germplasm Attribute Values externalDocs: description: Docs url: https://wiki.brapi.org/ - name: Crossing Projects description: Information about Crossing Projects externalDocs: description: Docs url: https://wiki.brapi.org/ - name: Crosses description: Information about Crosses externalDocs: description: Docs url: https://wiki.brapi.org/ - name: Seed Lots description: Information about Seed Lots externalDocs: description: Docs url: https://wiki.brapi.org/
